data.eml:eml: Revision of the Australian Ceratocanthinae (Coleoptera, Scarabaeoidea, Hybosoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ballerio, Alberto (2013): Revision of the Australian Ceratocanthinae (Coleoptera, Scarabaeoidea, Hybosoridae). ZooKeys 339: 67-91, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.339.6033, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.339.6033
